name: Candleminer
description:
Arrows - Move

Arrow + C - Push

P - Pause

The experienced miner Roberto Antônio, known as RobTônico, is hired by mining company Odiabesta to explore an ancient mine in Chapada dos Guimarães, an unexplored place. The further he goes, our hero finds himself trapped and needs to get out of this dark and treacherous underground labyrinth! On his journey, Rob will realize that in the midst of the untouched and deep darkness there are hidden mysteries and secrets that have never been awakened... 

An adventure, full of puzzles, enemies and a lot of mystery.

Game made  for a game jam.
